title: Gemunu to offer buses for peaceful youth protesters
body_lines: The Lanka Private Bus Owners' Association (LPBOA) has decided to provide free transport facilities for the youth who have engaged in peaceful protests.
Addressing the media LPBBOA Chairman Gemunu Wijerathne said they have decided to provide buses with adequate diesel to travel a distance of 20-25 km for peaceful protests.
Also he said the association has decided to park their buses around the Parliament in view to demonstrate their dissent to the present government. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
